short_summary: Supply and deliver chillers and condensers
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-04-08 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Reissue of Solicitation of Offers. This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number WS4362920342 dated 2024-01-12 with a closing of 2024-02-13 at 14:00 EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to supply and deliver chillers and condensers to Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), Canada Centre for Inland Waters (CCIW) in Burlington, Ontario.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Solicitation Title**
--------------------

# K8D10-240641 Chillers and Condensers (B)

**Reference Number**
-----------------

WS4472764898

**Publication Date**
-----------------

2024-03-07

**Tender Closing Date**
-------------------------

2024-04-08 at 2:00 PM EDT
### Please note:

- All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM on 2024-04-08.
- Bids submitted after 2:00 PM on 2024-04-08 will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Notice Type**
---------------

Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Tender Description**
------------------------

Canada is seeking offers from suppliers to supply and deliver chillers and condensers to Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), Canada Centre for Inland Waters (CCIW) in Burlington, Ontario.

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-05-31

### Contact Information
-------------------------

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

Jason Scott
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Phone: ""
Email: jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

The tender process is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
---------------------------

None

### Regions of Delivery
-------------------------

* Burlington, Ontario

____
